What's Binance?

Binance is one of the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges by trading volume. It offers a comprehensive platform for trading various cryptocurrencies, including spot trading, futures, options, and more.
The platform is known for its:

  • High liquidity and trading volume
  • Wide range of supported cryptocurrencies
  • Advanced trading features
  • Robust API for automated trading

API Key Setup Process

follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning="Never share your API keys with anyone. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials." %}

1 Create a Binance Account

Sign up for a Binance account if you don't have one. Sign up here.

2 Access API Management

  1. Log in to your Binance account
  2. Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner
  3. Select "API Management" from the dropdown menu

3 Create API Key

  1. Click "Create API"
  2. Choose "System generated"
  3. Give your API key a descriptive name.

4 Configure Security Settings

  1. Enable "Restrict access to trusted IPs only"
  2. Add our server's IP address: {{server_ip}}

5 Set Trading Permissions

Enable the following permissions based on your needs:

  • Spot & Margin Trading
  • Futures Trading

IMPORTANT: Make sure to copy your secret key before clicking save.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Binance account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.

{% comment %}

6 Complete Integration

Copy your API credentials and paste them in the add Binance form.
